entry.title: TSMC and China: Mutually assured destruction now measured in nanometers, not megatons
entry.summary:
The weapon too deadly to use is just a handful of dirt. Let's change that

entry.title: Iranian Hackers Spotted Using a new DNS Hijacking Malware in Recent Attacks
entry.summary: The Iranian state-sponsored threat actor tracked under the moniker Lyceum has turned to using a new custom .NET-based backdoor in recent campaigns directed against the Middle East.
